name: Waifu Wars Break
description:
Train your favorite anime waifus and let the war begin across the Waifu World! - Description -

Waifu Wars Break was made with the intent to bring a lot of anime girls together into one single game. It's the successor of Waifu Wars Splash.

Travel through the Waifu World, collect waifus and raise them to win strategic wars. Choose up to 5 girls to build your team and make them fight through a famous game inspired battle system.

- Features -
  • 150 waifus to collect
  • 11 maps to explore
  • Over 350 different battles
  • Over 90 moves usable in battle
  • Over 30 abilities
  • Memes and anime references
- Controls -
  • Mouse or touchscreen for mobile players
  • Keyboard for text input
- Credits -
